nick.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a very small cut made on the edge or surface of something
nick.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: You nicked those pens from my desk.
nick.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: to make a small cut in the surface or edge of something, usually by accident
nick.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: He nicked his hand on some broken glass.
nick.translation[1].definitions[2].defin: if the police nick you, they catch you and charge you with a crime
